name: Yuelao
description: Yuelao, god of romance and marriage, uses his red threads to unite destined couples.

skills.name: Fated Affection
skills.description: Yuelao heals several allies in sequence, each heal restoring HP equal to 140% of ATK, repeating 6 times. If a linked unit is healed, the other linked unit also receives the healing.

upgrades.level2: Each heal restores HP equal to 160% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Allies healed gain 20% increased CRIT Rate for 5s. This effect cannot stack on the same target.

skills.name: Red Thread of Fate
skills.description: Yuelao links the ally with the highest ATK and the ally with the highest HP with a red thread, making them share 10% of their ATK, HP, Armor, and M-RES. This skill refunds its CD if no valid targets exist.

upgrades.level3: If one linked ally falls, they transfer 50% of their remaining Energy to the other.

skills.name: Bond of Fated Pair
skills.description: Yuelao increases the ATK of the ally with the highest ATK by 15% for 8s and restores 150 Energy to them. If that ally is linked, Yuelao will also increase the ATK of the other linked ally and restore their Energy.

upgrades.level4: Increases ATK bonus to 25%. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Lanterns of Destiny
skills.description: Yuelao restores HP equal to 200% of ATK to the most vulnerable ally. If that ally is linked, Yuelao will also restore HP to the other linked ally.

upgrades.level3: Increases the allies' CRIT RES by 30% for 6s.
upgrades.level4: Restores HP equal to 250% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Fate Bound
relic.description: The linked unit with the highest max HP will take 20% of the DMG dealt to the linked unit with the highest ATK. The linked unit with the highest ATK restores HP equal to 20% of the DMG dealt to the unit with the highest HP when dealing DMG.

upgrades.level2: When both linked units attack the same target, they deal an additional 15% DMG.
upgrades.level3: The ally with the highest HP takes 30% of the DMG dealt to the ally with the highest ATK. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: The ally with the highest ATK restores HP equal to 30% of the DMG they deal to the ally with the highest HP. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
